edu.oakland.mvc

Interface IViewSelector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ThemeNameViewSelectorImpl

    public interface IViewSelector
    Determines which portlet theme to render. It contains just one method to do so.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-08-30
    Author:
    Aaron Grant
    See Also:
    PortletRequest API

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isMobile(PortletRequest request)
      Used to determine whether the desktop or mobile version of a portlet is to be rendered.

    • Method Detail

      • isMobile

        boolean isMobile(PortletRequest request)
        Used to determine whether the desktop or mobile version of a portlet is to be rendered.
        Parameters:
        request - a PortletRequest that contains information such as available desktop or mobile themes and which of these themes (if any) is being requested
        Returns:
        true if the mobile view is requested
